pyObjective!
=======================================

pyObjective is a python package to complement scipy's optimize toolbox.

.. automodule:: pyObjective
   :members:

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   

Usage
======

Look at the examples to see examples of how to use the package.
